ygData.subject: Re: Executioners Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: WRONG WRONG WRONG! Folks, lemme set this straight, from what ive heard from good sources....the execiutioners axe is found either through a quest by killing
ygData.messageBody:
WRONG WRONG WRONG!

Folks, lemme set this straight, from what ive heard from good sources....the
execiutioners axe is found either through a quest by killing Crushbone
himself, of by looting it off his body, its stats ARE 25 damage, 50 speed
BUT it casts a haste spell which brings the speed all the way down to 25!!!
now thats speed!

If you want to know where to get it for sure, go check the gameznet EQ site
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745
